posts.post_content:
I am selling off graded singles from my private collection.  These have tremendous appeal for the given grades and present true to the fact by the card and not the holder.  These have great centering and have been cherished in my personal sets for years.  I need to raise some cash so time to move them out to other collectors that can appreciate the hunt for exceptional looking cards with striking color, contrast and clean backs.  My email is [url]ekekela08@aol.com[/url].  I prefer payment by check or MO.  

[url]http://s135.photobucket.com/user/iakona8/slideshow/Graded%20cards%20for%20sale[/url]

Are there prices anywhere?

NM, I just noticed them in the titles.

Thanks.
